backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update that changes the hero message text in the homepage App.tsx file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of several frontend files including App, styles, config, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm OKLCH color palette for light and dark modes with global background and text variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the romantic homepage with hero message, dating info, and memories gallery.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Modal component that displays a full-size image with close controls and Escape/overlay handling.
Interactive grid gallery of memory photos with click‑to‑open lightbox functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a romantic warm color palette and global typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, including existing and pending feature requests for updating the homepage hero message.
